name: Shoot My Way
description:
In this world, all you can do is moving by shooting with your gun, but it's just not as simple as that. You'll have to discover how to use the capacities all the different classes allow.

Just by shooting you can actually move, kill enemies, destroy their proyectiles, push buttons with your body, choose your favourite class and difficulty, train your shield skills and much more.

Platform: Windows

Authors:

  • Ricardo Franco Martín
  • José Carlos Franco Martín

Software:

  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
  • Photoshop
  • Fl Studio
  • Audacity
  • Bosca Ceoil
